abstract: Sure, few people were prepared for the rolling disaster of the subprime mortgage crisis and its huge financial repercussions, but some investors saw it coming, and in an excerpt from Michael Lewis’s new book, “The Big Short: Inside the Doomsday Machine,” one hedge fund manager shows he was way ahead of his time.
